title: june 5: the assassination of Robert F. Kennedy (with Claire Rosinkranz)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, Maia talks about the 1968 assassination of Robert F. Kennedy, the brother of slain president John F. Kennedy and himself a candidate for president. After, she chats with guest Claire Rosinkranz. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
